languages.text: "Ты лишена преференций и особого положения агента Золотого Трона, и я могу применить к тебе средства дознания в соответствии со стандартной схемой извлечения информации, чтобы узнать сведения о судьбе аколита Танакии Калбергария. Необходимо ли это, Эмелина?"

"You are hereby stripped of your special status as an agent of the Golden Throne and all attendant rights and privileges. I am authorised to use all interrogation measures stipulated in the standard framework for information extraction to ascertain the fate of acolyte Tanakia Calbergaria. Will that be necessary, Emelina?"
languages.original_text: "Ты лишена преференций и особого положения агента Золотого Трона, и я могу применить к тебе средства дознания в соответствии со стандартной схемой извлечения информации, чтобы узнать сведения о судьбе аколита Танакии Калбергария. Необходимо ли это, Эмелина?"

traits.locale_text: "You are hereby stripped of your special status as an agent of the Golden Throne and all attendant rights and privileges. I am authorised to use all interrogation measures stipulated in the standard framework for information extraction to ascertain the fate of acolyte Tanakia Calbergaria. Will that be necessary, Emelina?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are hereby stripped of your special status as an agent of the Golden Throne and all attendant rights and privileges. I am authorised to use all interrogation measures stipulated in the standard framework for information extraction to ascertain the fate of acolyte Tanakia Calbergaria. Will that be necessary, Emelina?"

traits.locale_text: "You are hereby stripped of your special status as an agent of the Golden Throne and all attendant rights and privileges. I am authorised to use all interrogation measures stipulated in the standard framework for information extraction to ascertain the fate of acolyte Tanakia Calbergaria. Will that be necessary, Emelina?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are hereby stripped of your special status as an agent of the Golden Throne and all attendant rights and privileges. I am authorised to use all interrogation measures stipulated in the standard framework for information extraction to ascertain the fate of acolyte Tanakia Calbergaria. Will that be necessary, Emelina?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我在此剥夺你身为黄金王座代理人的特殊身份，剥夺你所有随之而来的权利和特权。我在此获得授权，允许使用信息提取标准流程中的一切审讯措施，用以查明侍仆塔娜基娅·卡贝加利亚的下落。你认为有必要这么做吗，艾米莉娜？”
languages.original_text: "You are hereby stripped of your special status as an agent of the Golden Throne and all attendant rights and privileges. I am authorised to use all interrogation measures stipulated in the standard framework for information extraction to ascertain the fate of acolyte Tanakia Calbergaria. Will that be necessary, Emelina?"

traits.locale_text: “我在此剥夺你身为黄金王座代理人的特殊身份，剥夺你所有随之而来的权利和特权。我在此获得授权，允许使用信息提取标准流程中的一切审讯措施，用以查明侍仆塔娜基娅·卡贝加利亚的下落。你认为有必要这么做吗，艾米莉娜？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Por la presente, queda relegada de su estado especial como agente del Trono Dorado y de todos los derechos y privilegios correspondientes. Estoy autorizado para utilizar todas las medidas de interrogación estipuladas en el marco estándar de extracción de información para confirmar el destino de la acólita Tanakia Calbergaria. ¿Será necesario que lo haga, Emelina?».
languages.original_text: "You are hereby stripped of your special status as an agent of the Golden Throne and all attendant rights and privileges. I am authorised to use all interrogation measures stipulated in the standard framework for information extraction to ascertain the fate of acolyte Tanakia Calbergaria. Will that be necessary, Emelina?"

traits.locale_text: «Por la presente, queda relegada de su estado especial como agente del Trono Dorado y de todos los derechos y privilegios correspondientes. Estoy autorizado para utilizar todas las medidas de interrogación estipuladas en el marco estándar de extracción de información para confirmar el destino de la acólita Tanakia Calbergaria. ¿Será necesario que lo haga, Emelina?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「これにより、あなたは黄金の玉座のエージェントとしての特別な地位と、それに付随するすべての権利と特権を剥奪されます。我には、アコライト、タナキア・カルベルガリアの運命を確かめるために、情報抽出のための標準的な枠組みに規定されているすべての尋問手段を使用する権限が与えられています。エメリナさん、準備をした方がいいですか？」
languages.original_text: "You are hereby stripped of your special status as an agent of the Golden Throne and all attendant rights and privileges. I am authorised to use all interrogation measures stipulated in the standard framework for information extraction to ascertain the fate of acolyte Tanakia Calbergaria. Will that be necessary, Emelina?"

traits.locale_text: 「これにより、あなたは黄金の玉座のエージェントとしての特別な地位と、それに付随するすべての権利と特権を剥奪されます。我には、アコライト、タナキア・カルベルガリアの運命を確かめるために、情報抽出のための標準的な枠組みに規定されているすべての尋問手段を使用する権限が与えられています。エメリナさん、準備をした方がいいですか？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous retire dès à présent votre statut spécial d'agent du Trône d'Or et tous les droits et privilèges qui en découlent. Je suis habilité à me servir de toutes les mesures d'interrogation stipulées dans les procédures standard pour l'extraction d'informations qui permettront de déterminer le sort de l'acolyte Tanakia Calbergaria. Cela sera-t-il nécessaire, Emelina ? »
languages.original_text: "You are hereby stripped of your special status as an agent of the Golden Throne and all attendant rights and privileges. I am authorised to use all interrogation measures stipulated in the standard framework for information extraction to ascertain the fate of acolyte Tanakia Calbergaria. Will that be necessary, Emelina?"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous retire dès à présent votre statut spécial d'agent du Trône d'Or et tous les droits et privilèges qui en découlent. Je suis habilité à me servir de toutes les mesures d'interrogation stipulées dans les procédures standard pour l'extraction d'informations qui permettront de déterminer le sort de l'acolyte Tanakia Calbergaria. Cela sera-t-il nécessaire, Emelina ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Euch wird hiermit Euer Sonderstatus als Agentin des Goldenen Throns entzogen, zusammen mit allen Rechten und Privilegien. Ich bin autorisiert, alle im Standardvorgehen zur Informationsbeschaffung aufgeführten Verhörmethoden einzusetzen, um das Schicksal von Akolythin Tanakia Calbergaria zu ermitteln. Wird das erforderlich sein, Emelina?"
languages.original_text: "You are hereby stripped of your special status as an agent of the Golden Throne and all attendant rights and privileges. I am authorised to use all interrogation measures stipulated in the standard framework for information extraction to ascertain the fate of acolyte Tanakia Calbergaria. Will that be necessary, Emelina?"

traits.locale_text: "Euch wird hiermit Euer Sonderstatus als Agentin des Goldenen Throns entzogen, zusammen mit allen Rechten und Privilegien. Ich bin autorisiert, alle im Standardvorgehen zur Informationsbeschaffung aufgeführten Verhörmethoden einzusetzen, um das Schicksal von Akolythin Tanakia Calbergaria zu ermitteln. Wird das erforderlich sein, Emelina?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bu andan itibaren Altın Taht'ın ajanı olma statün, yanında getirdiği tüm haklar ve imtiyazlarla beraber elinden alınmıştır. Havari Tanakia Calbergaria'ya ne olduğunu öğrenmek adına, standart bilgi ayıklama prosedürü çerçevesinde belirtilen tüm sorgulama yöntemlerini kullanma yetkisine sahibim. Beni bunları kullanmaya mecbur bırakacak mısın Emelina?"
languages.original_text: "You are hereby stripped of your special status as an agent of the Golden Throne and all attendant rights and privileges. I am authorised to use all interrogation measures stipulated in the standard framework for information extraction to ascertain the fate of acolyte Tanakia Calbergaria. Will that be necessary, Emelina?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu andan itibaren Altın Taht'ın bir ajanı olma statün, yanında getirdiği tüm haklar ve imtiyazlarla beraber elinden alınıyor. Havari Tanakia Calbergaria'ya ne olduğunu öğrenmek adına, standart bilgi ayıklama çerçevesinde belirtilen tüm sorgulama yöntemlerini kullanmaya yetkiliyim. Onları kullanmam gerekecek mi Emelina?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
